description: The SNMP trap that is generated when a board is inserted
into a particular slot in the chassis.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpSlotInsertEvent LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpSlotIndex i 9999 LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpSlotBoardType i 1 LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpSlotBoardRevision s E

description: The physical slot number of this slot within the
system.
variables.name: LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpSlotIndex

description: The type of board residing in this slot.
variables.name: LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpSlotBoardType

description: The revision number of the board in this slot.
variables.name: LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpSlotBoardRevision

description: The SNMP trap that is generated when a board is extracted
from a particular slot in the chassis.
The physical slot number of this slot within the
system.
variables.name: LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpSlotIndex

description: The SNMP trap that is generated when the number of
addresses stored in the bridge reaches
lpBridgeAddressThreshold.
A unique value for each bridge function in the system.
It's value ranges between 1 and the value of
lpSystemBridgeFunctionCount.
variables.name: LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpBridgeIndex

description: The slot number of the lowest numbered slot which
contains a physical port that this bridge function
controls.
variables.name: LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpBridgeBaseSlotIndex

description: The SNMP trap that is generated when the system
temperature exceeds a certain threshold.
The SNMP trap that is generated when the temperature of
a board in a particular slot exceeds a certain threshold.

event.Summary: $v2 board temperature in slot $v1 exceeded the threshold

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpSlotOverTemperatureEvent LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpSlotIndex i 9999 LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpSlotBoardType i 1 LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpSlotBoardRevision s E LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpSlotBoardStatus i 1

description: The physical slot number of this slot within the
system.
variables.name: LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpSlotIndex

description: The type of board residing in this slot.
variables.name: LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpSlotBoardType

description: The revision number of the board in this slot.
variables.name: LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpSlotBoardRevision

description: The status of the board in this slot.
variables.name: LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpSlotBoardStatus

description: The SNMP trap that is generated when a power supply
unit fails in the system.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpPowerSupplyFailureEvent LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpPowerSupplyIndex i 9999 LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpPowerSupplyLocation i 9999 LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpPowerSupplyLastFailure i 1 LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpSystemPowerSupplyCount i 9999

description: A unique value for each power supply in the system.
It's value ranges between 1 and the value of
lpSystemPowerSupplyCount.
variables.name: LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpPowerSupplyIndex

description: The physical slot in which this power supply unit
resides in the system.
variables.name: LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpPowerSupplyLocation

description: This object represents the most recent power
supply failure type. If no failure has occured
the value of this object is none. This object is
included in the varlist when the lpPowerSupplyFailureEvent
trap is generated. It indicates the failure type that
caused the trap to be generated.
variables.name: LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpPowerSupplyLastFailure

description: The number of power supply units present in the system.
variables.name: LANPLEX-MIB-1-2-9::lpSystemPowerSupplyCount
